vlive.korean: 모든 관객분들께 한번 인사를 드려볼까요? Shall we say to hi to all our audience? 듣기 View video BTS : [Full] BTS Comeback Special: '보'이는 '라'이브 '해'요

vlive.korean: '모든 날 모든 순간이 너였다' 아니에요? - '모든 날'이 뭐야? Isn't it "Every Day, Every Moment"? - What's the song? 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : TO DO X TOMORROW X TOGETHER 2020 - EP.7
vlive.english: Isn't it "Every Day, Every Moment"? - What's the song?

vlive.korean: [정답은 '모든 날 모든 순간'] '모든 날 모든 순간'까지 아니야? [Answer is "Every Day, Every Moment"] Isn't is "Every Day, Every Moment"? 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : TO DO X TOMORROW X TOGETHER 2020 - EP.7
vlive.english: [Answer is "Every Day, Every Moment"] Isn't is "Every Day, Every Moment"?

vlive.korean: 진 형, 진 형 - 네 - 모든 것이 초기화되면 어떨 것 같아요? Jin, Jin. - Yes. - What do think will happen if everything is reset? 듣기 View video BTS : [Full] BTS Comeback Special: '보'이는 '라'이브 '해'요
vlive.english: Jin, Jin. - Yes. - What do think will happen if everything is reset?

vlive.korean: [모든 것은 TMI가 된다] - 너무 많이 아이콘택트 - 그 I가 그 I 맞나요? [Everything can be TMI] - Too Much Eye contact. - Is it "I" at the end? 듣기 View video TREASURE (트레저) : TREASURE - [T.M.I] EP.4
vlive.english: [Everything can be TMI] - Too Much Eye contact. - Is it "I" at the end?
